content.raw:
Chris,

Can you please run these commands again?

```
  $ rm -rfv ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models
  $ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade libignition* 
  $ sudo reboot
```

After rebooting, can you post here the output from this command?

```
$ sudo dpkg -l | grep -i ignition
```

‌
content.html:
Chris,

Can you please run these commands again?

  $ rm -rfv ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models
  $ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade libignition* 
  $ sudo reboot

After rebooting, can you post here the output from this command?

$ sudo dpkg -l | grep -i ignition

‌

ii ros-melodic-ros-ign 0.7.1-11bionic amd64 Meta-package containing interfaces for using ROS with Ignition simulation.
ii ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge 0.7.1-12bionic amd64 Bridge communication between ROS and Ignition Transport
ii ros-melodic-ros-ign-gazebo-demos 0.7.1-12bionic amd64 Demos using Ignition Gazebo simulation with ROS.
ii ros-melodic-ros-ign-image 0.7.1-12bionic amd64 Image utilities for Ignition simulation with ROS.
ii ros-melodic-ros-ign-point-cloud 0.7.1-11bionic amd64 Point cloud utilities for Ignition simulation with ROS.
ii ros1-ign-bridge 0.3.0-1~bionic amd64 Bridge between Ignition messages and ROS1 messages

content.raw:
Can you try removing `ros1-ign-bridge`? That package is deprecated in favor of `ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge`

Related issue #99.
content.html:
Can you try removing ros1-ign-bridge? That package is deprecated in favor of ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge

Related issue #99.

content.raw:
As Addisu indicated, remove `ros1-ign-bridge` and rebuild the workspace again.

`$ sudo apt-get remove ros1-ign-bridge`
content.html:
As Addisu indicated, remove ros1-ign-bridge and rebuild the workspace again.

$ sudo apt-get remove ros1-ign-bridge

content.raw:
It looks like it's not finding `ros1_ign_bridge`. Can you check if it's installed properly, it would be the `ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge` package? What is the output of this command `rospack find ros1_ign_bridge`?

EDIT: Changed `ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge`  to `ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge`. i.e. `ros` -> `ros1`
content.html:
It looks like it's not finding ros1_ign_bridge. Can you check if it's installed properly, it would be the ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge package? What is the output of this command rospack find ros1_ign_bridge?

EDIT: Changed ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge to ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge. i.e. ros -> ros1

content.raw:
Rospack can’t find it:  
\[rospack\] Error: package 'ros1\_ign\_bridge' not found

I tried to install with APT but it’s already installed:  
ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge is already the newest version \(0.7.1-12bionic\).  
ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge set to manually installed.

Any other suggestions would be appreciated.
content.html:
Rospack can’t find it:
[rospack] Error: package 'ros1_ign_bridge' not found

I tried to install with APT but it’s already installed:
ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge is already the newest version (0.7.1-12bionic).
ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge set to manually installed.

Any other suggestions would be appreciated.

content.raw:
Another thing to try is to reinstall `ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge` by running `sudo apt-get install --reinstall ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge`.

I also noticed that you have version 0.7.1 of `ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge`, but the stable version is 0.7.0. I suspect you have the prerelease repos added. Check if you have the file `/etc/apt/sources.list.d/gazebo-prerelease.list'`. If you do have it, I would suggest

 1. removing that file
 2. removing all the packages you listed above, and
 3. going through the steps in the [installation instructions](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall). 

P.S. From the list you provided earlier, you can remove all the ignition packages with the following command:

```
sudo apt-get remove ignition-blueprint ignition-gazebo2 ignition-tools:amd64 libignition-cmake-dev:amd64 libignition-cmake2-dev:amd64 libignition-common:amd64 libignition-common-dev:amd64 libignition-common3:amd64 libignition-common3-av:amd64 libignition-common3-av-dev:amd64 libignition-common3-core-dev:amd64 libignition-common3-dev:amd64 libignition-common3-events:amd64 libignition-common3-events-dev:amd64 libignition-common3-graphics:amd64 libignition-common3-graphics-dev:amd64 libignition-common3-profiler:amd64 libignition-common3-profiler-dev:amd64 libignition-fuel-tools1-1:amd64 libignition-fuel-tools1-dev:amd64 libignition-fuel-tools3:amd64 libignition-fuel-tools3-dev:amd64 libignition-gazebo2:amd64 libignition-gazebo2-dev:amd64 libignition-gazebo2-plugins:amd64 libignition-gui2:amd64 libignition-gui2-dev:amd64 libignition-launch:amd64 libignition-launch-dev:amd64 libignition-math4:amd64 libignition-math4-dev:amd64 libignition-math6:amd64 libignition-math6-dev:amd64 libignition-math6-eigen3-dev:amd64 libignition-msgs:amd64 libignition-msgs-dev:amd64 libignition-msgs4:amd64 libignition-msgs4-dev:amd64 libignition-physics:amd64 libignition-physics-core-dev:amd64 libignition-physics-dartsim:amd64 libignition-physics-dartsim-dev:amd64 libignition-physics-dev:amd64 libignition-physics-mesh-dev:amd64 libignition-physics-sdf-dev:amd64 libignition-plugin:amd64 libignition-plugin-dev:amd64 libignition-rendering2:amd64 libignition-rendering2-core-dev:amd64 libignition-rendering2-dev:amd64 libignition-rendering2-ogre1:amd64 libignition-rendering2-ogre1-dev:amd64 libignition-rendering2-ogre2:amd64 libignition-rendering2-ogre2-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2:amd64 libignition-sensors2-air-pressure:amd64 libignition-sensors2-air-pressure-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-altimeter:amd64 libignition-sensors2-altimeter-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-camera:amd64 libignition-sensors2-camera-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-core-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-depth-camera:amd64 libignition-sensors2-depth-camera-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-gpu-lidar:amd64 libignition-sensors2-gpu-lidar-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-imu:amd64 libignition-sensors2-imu-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-lidar:amd64 libignition-sensors2-lidar-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-logical-camera:amd64 libignition-sensors2-logical-camera-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-magnetometer:amd64 libignition-sensors2-magnetometer-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-rendering:amd64 libignition-sensors2-rendering-dev:amd64 libignition-sensors2-rgbd-camera:amd64 libignition-sensors2-rgbd-camera-dev:amd64 libignition-tools-dev:amd64 libignition-transport4:amd64 libignition-transport4-dev:amd64 libignition-transport7:amd64 libignition-transport7-core-dev:amd64 libignition-transport7-dev:amd64 libignition-transport7-log:amd64 libignition-transport7-log-dev:amd64
```

EDIT:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} brought to my attention the difference between `ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge` and `ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge`. The former is `ros` without the `1` suffix and is only in the prerelease repo, which should not be used by SubT teams. So, please try removing the prerelease repo according to the instructions above and ensure that `ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge` is installed. From your error messages, it looks like you will also need `ros-melodic-ros1-ign-image`.
content.html:
Another thing to try is to reinstall ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge by running sudo apt-get install --reinstall ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge.

I also noticed that you have version 0.7.1 of ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge, but the stable version is 0.7.0. I suspect you have the prerelease repos added. Check if you have the file /etc/apt/sources.list.d/gazebo-prerelease.list'. If you do have it, I would suggest

  1. removing that file
  2. removing all the packages you listed above, and
  3. going through the steps in the installation instructions.

P.S. From the list you provided earlier, you can remove all the ignition packages with the following command:

sudo apt-get remove ignition-blueprint ignition-gazebo2 ignition-tools:amd64 libignition-cmake-dev:amd64 libignition-cmake2-dev:amd64 libignition-common:amd64 libignition-common-dev:amd64 EDIT: @Alfredo Bencomo brought to my attention the difference between ros-melodic-ros-ign-bridge and ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge. The former is ros without the 1 suffix and is only in the prerelease repo, which should not be used by SubT teams. So, please try removing the prerelease repo according to the instructions above and ensure that ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge is installed. From your error messages, it looks like you will also need ros-melodic-ros1-ign-image.
